mapper.select:
select count(*) from board board LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bnum, count(bnum) reply_cnt FROM board_comments WHERE is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY bnum ) cmt ON board.num = cmt.bnum where 1=1
and board.user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.subject like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.category = '정보'
and board.category = '후기'
and board.category = '추천'
and board.category = '잡담'
and board.user_id = #{loginId}

SELECT board.*, cmt.reply_cnt boardcomments_count FROM board board LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bnum, count(bnum) reply_cnt FROM board_comments WHERE is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY bnum ) cmt ON board.num = cmt.bnum where 1=1
and board.user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.subject like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and board.category = '정보'
and board.category = '후기'
and board.category = '추천'
and board.category = '잡담'
and board.user_id = #{loginId}
order by
board.reg_date desc
board.readcount desc
board.num asc
cmt.reply_cnt desc NULLS LAST
board.num asc
mapper.insert: insert into board(num, user_id, category, subject, content, reg_date, image) values(board_seq.nextval,#{userid},#{category},#{subject},#{content},sysdate,#{image})
